name: Nano Puzzle
description: This is a puzzle game where you play as a nanorobot trying to solve puzzles for no apparent reason. Can you solve all 25, plus 10 tutorials. The three expansions Exclusive, Manic, and Quantum are included in any version you get, if its on gamejolt or here on this site. Manic is 10 levels long, Exclusive and Quantum are 15 levels each, making the game 75 levels long.
